name: Mastermind Codebreaker Disk

pages.text: Accidentally captchalogued your favorite item? The Mastermind Codebreaker Disk exists to fix that issue!$(br)Just insert it in a computer, hold your card out, and open the program!$(br)It can also rewrite the card's code.
Combine a Blank Disk and a Mastermind Modus in a Totem Lathe.

pages: Some could argue that it's useless, as you can just swap modus...
